questions.question: Has relevant educational background for the role
questions.answer: Completed Bachelor's in Computer Science and relevant online courses.

questions.question: Shows commitment to continuous learning
questions.answer: Regularly takes new certifications and participates in hackathons.

questions.question: Has relevant certifications or training
questions.answer: Certified in AWS Cloud Practitioner and React.js.

questions.question: Demonstrated strong technical skills
questions.answer: Excellent in React, Node.js, and MongoDB development.

questions.question: Communicated ideas clearly and effectively
questions.answer: Explained project workflows with clear reasoning and examples.

questions.question: Shows genuine enthusiasm for the role
questions.answer: Very motivated to join a fast-paced environment and contribute to team success.

questions.question: Came well-prepared for the interview
questions.answer: Reviewed company projects, values, and recent releases in advance.

questions.question: Shows proactive approach to work
questions.answer: Frequently identifies issues early and suggests improvements.

questions.question: Strongly recommend for hire
questions.answer: Would be a great fit for this position due to both technical and interpersonal strengths.
